sentences.en: "I think I've covered that business more than adequately," he said gravely.
sentences.cn: “我想我已经把那件事说得够详细了，”他正色说道。

sentences.en: Any room where gas is used must be adequately supplied with air.
sentences.cn: 任何使用煤气的房间都必须有充足的空气.

sentences.en: Do the BBC External Services adequately project Great Britain?
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司的海外广播部能使听众对英国有正确认识 吗 ?

sentences.en: Firstly, they must make certain that their pension needs are adequately catered for.
sentences.cn: 首先，他们得确保他们能获得足够的养老金。

sentences.en: I provided some teaser output, but this was not sufficently extensive nor well organized so that you could adequately interpret the results of the analysis.
sentences.cn: 我提供了一些难处理的输出，但是这既不够充分也没进行很好的组织，以致您无法充分地解释分析结果。

sentences.en: I think we lack a citizenry that is adequately willing to take responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们缺乏非常愿意承担责任的公民。

sentences.en: Many students are not adequately prepared for higher education.
sentences.cn: 许多学生并未做好接受高等教育的充分准备。

sentences.en: Poetry can never be adequately rendered in another language.
sentences.cn: 诗从来不能贴贴切切翻译成另一种语言.

sentences.en: Problems arise when the body's immune system is not functioning adequately.
sentences.cn: 免疫系统不能充分发挥作用时,身体就会出现问题.

sentences.en: She does the job adequately but she's not going to set the world on fire!
sentences.cn: 她工作做得不错,但也不会有什么惊人之举!

sentences.en: That brush is not adequately bristled for heavy cleaning.
sentences.cn: 那把刷子刚毛不够,不适用于用力洗刷.

sentences.en: The book is clear, readable and adequately illustrated.
sentences.cn: 这本书明白易懂，可读性强，插图丰富。

sentences.en: They had equipped their workers adequately for such dangerous condition.
sentences.cn: 他们让工人们充分装备起来,以应付这样的危险情况.

sentences.en: Vitamin B 6 must be adequately supplied.
